author: pamarcelot
msg: Specified, as well, the 'filenames' attribute in the editor extension definition to allow the editor to appear in the list of editors in the 'Open With...' context-menu sub-item.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added a ContentDescriber class which checks that the given file is a correct ApacheDS Configuration 2.0 file.
Defined a specific content type which rules the opening of the Editor.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Setting the 'default' attribute to 'false' to allow other specific LDIF-based editors to override the default LDIF Editor (like the ApacheDS 2.0 Configuration Editor).

author: sebastien
msg: Update javadoc link for future releases
